org.akubraproject.map
Interface IdMapper

public interface IdMapper

Maps internal blob ids to external blob ids and vice-versa.

Author:
Chris Wilper

Method Summary
 URI getExternalId(URI internalId)
          Gets the appropriate external id for an internal id.
 URI getInternalId(URI externalId)
          Gets the appropriate internal id for an external id.
 String getInternalPrefix(String externalPrefix)
          Gets the internal id prefix for an external id prefix, if known.

getExternalId

URI getExternalId(URI internalId)
                  throws NullPointerException
Gets the appropriate external id for an internal id.

Parameters:
internalId - the internal id, never null.
Returns:
the external id, never null.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if internalId is null.

                  throws NullPointerException
Gets the appropriate internal id for an external id.

Returns:
the internal id, never null.

getInternalPrefix

String getInternalPrefix(String externalPrefix)
                         throws NullPointerException
Gets the internal id prefix for an external id prefix, if known. Implementations should provide this information whenever possible because it supports a more efficient implementation of BlobStoreConnection.listBlobIds(String) when a filterPrefix is specified.

Parameters:
externalPrefix - the external prefix, never null.
Returns:
the internal prefix, or null if unknown.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if externalPrefix is null.
